channel.title: Solutions on ECSE 506: Stochastic Control and Decision Theory
channel.description: Recent content in Solutions on ECSE 506: Stochastic Control and Decision Theory

item.title: Assignment 1 (solution)
item.description: Problem 1 The code below is written for ease of reading, not efficiency. It can be made more efficient by replace the for loops by matrix multiplication. julia> (X,U,W) = (2,3,3); julia> P = [0.25 0.15 0.05; 0.30 0.10 0.15] 2×3 Array{Float64,2}: 0.25 0.15 0.05 0.3 0.1 0.15 julia> C = zeros(X,U,W); julia> C[:,:,1] = [3 5 1; 2 3 1]; julia> C[:,:,2] = [4 3 1; 1 2 8]; julia> C[:,:,3] = [1 2 2; 4 1 3]; julia> C 2×3×3 Array{Float64,3}: [:, :, 1] = 3.
